code:
import{useEffect}from'react';import useEventCallback from'./useEventCallback';/**
 * Attaches an event handler outside directly to specified DOM element
 * bypassing the react synthetic event system.
 *
 * @param element The target to listen for events on
 * @param event The DOM event name
 * @param handler An event handler
 * @param capture Whether or not to listen during the capture event phase
 */export default function useEventListener(eventTarget,event,listener){let capture=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:false;const handler=useEventCallback(listener);useEffect(()=>{const target=typeof eventTarget==='function'?eventTarget():eventTarget;target.addEventListener(event,handler,capture);return()=>target.removeEventListener(event,handler,capture);},[eventTarget]);}
